scripts.contracts:deploy:local: cd packages/contracts && forge script script/Counter.s.sol:CounterScript --rpc-url local --broadcast
scripts.contracts:deploy:dukong: cd packages/contracts && forge script script/Counter.s.sol:CounterScript --rpc-url mantra_dukong --broadcast --verify --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://explorer.dukong.io/api
scripts.contracts:deploy:mainnet: cd packages/contracts && forge script script/Counter.s.sol:CounterScript --rpc-url mantra_mainnet --broadcast --verify --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://blockscout.mantrascan.io/api
scripts.contracts:verify:dukong: cd packages/contracts && forge verify-contract --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://explorer.dukong.io/api
scripts.contracts:verify:mainnet: cd packages/contracts && forge verify-contract --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://blockscout.mantrascan.io/api
